name: TetroManiac
body:
#Tetromaniac
This page is created to describe the details of the ideas and concepts used for the Tetris Bot TetroManiac. This bot is operating inside the [AiGames-Blockbattle](http://theaigames.com/competitions/ai-block-battle) platform. The following chapters will mention the different steps that were taken in developing the Bot. 

##Basic Rules


##Input/Output
##Find possible Moves
##Choosing Features
##Selecting Optimal Move
###Heuristic Approach
###Q-learning Approach 
##Results
##Authors
The aforementioned project was created by Chamzas Konstantinos (@ChamzasKonstantinos) and Papoudakis Georgios(@papoudakis)
